import React, { useEffect, useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { AdminContext } from '../../App'; const DisplayAllMessages = () => { const [messages, setMessages] = useState([]); const { adminState, dispatchadmin } = useContext(AdminContext); useEffect(() => { fetch('/messages') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setMessages(data)) .catch((error) => console.error(error)); }, []); const deleteMessage = (messageId) => { fetch(`/messages/${messageId}`, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { if (data.success) { // If the message is successfully deleted, update the state to remove the deleted message setMessages((prevMessages) => prevMessages.filter((message) => message._id !== messageId) ); } }) .catch((error) => console.error(error)); }; const Loginbutton = () => { if (adminState) { return (
); } else { return (
); } }; return (
